Articles.Content:
I've noticed something very strange about SpacePort that involves the number of downloads and the rating of an addon. If I'm logged in to SpacePort, my addon downloads number is 11345. However, if I'm not logged on the number is reduced to 8469. That's a difference of about 3,000 downloads. Anyone have a clue what is happening? Also if I'm logged in the average rating is 161 ratings at 5 stars. If I'm not logged in the average rating is 159 at 5 stars.

BTW I also saw that my comments count while I'm not logged on is 25, while when I am logged on it is 33. This doesn't seem to affect the actual comments, though.

Edited May 16, 2013 by jandcando
More weirdness.
